author: Benjamin Lehmann
description: A library with the goal of solving the same problems as Apollo, but for usecases beyond GraphQL, even outside of AJAX.
name: @phoebusjs/phoebus-core

scripts.build: tsc && npx typedoc index.ts --theme minimal --excludeNotDocumented --readme none --out ../../docs/core
scripts.test: Echo tests can be run from the /tests directory.
